title: Shaco new homeguard animation
body:

Rory you are a legend .  

I hope this gets into the game , imagine Predator Shaco coming at you full speed on a unicycle haha

replies.body:
WTF
This looks silly but amazing at the same time.
This definetly brings Shaco as a character on a whole new level!

**this comes into my lane**
Me:_ "Oh shit, waddup?"_

> [{quoted}](name=Rägnarok,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9TKPBOzF,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-11-15T21:37:05.765+0000)
>
> **this comes into my lane**
> Me:_ "Oh shit, waddup?"_

######Here.

######Comes.

######That.

#BOOOOIIII

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Rhinark,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9TKPBOzF,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2018-11-16T07:25:52.356+0000)
>
> ######Here.
> 
> ######Comes.
> 
> ######That.
> 
> #BOOOOIIII

The reality ingame.

1. This thing will come honking horns and peddling extremely fast towards you.
2. Suddenly it would be gone in a puff of smoke.
3. It is already behind and ignited you.

...scary than most horror movies these days.
Omae mou Shinderu
Memes never die!
Predator Shaco new meta

In Motion:

https://twitter.com/RoryAlderton/status/1062979420611215361?s=20

Brilliant. Absolutely Brilliant.

The only thing they need to add this is for Shaco to juggle while doing this.
this makes me think of the potential shaco has when he is getting a VU
this is so fucking stupid. i love it.
Lmao who cares about the VGU, this is all we need.
I hope Riot knows that they're now required to keep this when Shaco get his inevitable VGU.
Plz rito shaco needs it.{{champion:35}}
I hope this gets pushed through.
Even his unicycle will be dealing more damage than his daggers lol.
_New Hidden passive Coulrophobia: Enemies either gain or revive their irrational fear of clowns, and it hurts_
Haha, that's great, I rode my unicycle to school today actually
this is actually incredibly good
Yes, this is great!
How about a SKIN you know with PARTICLE EFFECTS :^) cough cough
Here come dat Shaco, Shit waddup. His ult is going to look like a dat boi or something xD
Meanwhile ahri gets milions of amazing skills shaco gets this. I mean its cool but make shaco skin with particle effects. Imagine how cool a program shaco would be...
There's little to no effects of the to really work with on the character as it is. Plus he is a tier 1 candidate so he has had low chances of getting great skins for awhile.
This exactly what I expect from shaco.
I want this NOW.
Gimme gimme
